Articles.Content:
Hi, I normally just play with a handful of mods (three actually) but I was wondering if there was a good stockalike mod for soviet/russian stuff like soyuz and  Vostok.  

Also is there a good camera mod to have cameras for probes and for film return missions?

And I am a idiot, i found the Tantares parts as soon as I posted this.  My Apologies.

Hi! a bit late!

With stock DLC Making Story is possible to fully build the Vostok 1 Rocket and orbiter, and is beutifull! i Love it! extremely stable, the one that put in orbit Yuri Gagarin, but in this case Jeb is the first one i guess... With this you can recreate the entire Vostok Program, from Sputnik to Vostok 6. I use it to place must of my satellites even around Mün.

Also, with the stock DLC is possible to build the soyuz rocket, but not the capsule because there is not a suitable stock capsule and reentry module.

For a full experience, try using AlphaMensae mod Modular Launch Pads already updated to 1.8, with the Vostok/Soyuz Launch Pad from Baikonur : 

AlphaMensae's Modular Launch Pad Mod

 For the entire of the soviet program, from Vostok, Soyuz, Salyut, Mir and probes, Tantares is the mod you are looking for:

Tantares Mod
